layout: default title: “(d) Computerized Internet Sweepstakes Terminal Café shall be located only in the ED, Employment Center District Zoning” istrict, Section 1264.15 of the Planning and Zoning Code. No Computerized Sweepstakes Terminal Café shall be located upon a parcel that abuts residentially zoned property. No Computerized Sweepstakes Terminal Café shall be located closer than one thousand (1,000) feet from another Computerized Sweepstakes Terminal Café. (Ord. 11-9. Passed 4-7-11.)
